resources.string: Add all the subjects that your institution deals with. You can add N number of subjects and later assign subjects to classes from this subject list.

Create exams by adding the time period. Exams can be assigned to classes and teachers can update marks for these exams.Exams can also be assigned with co-scholastic activities like Health Education, Physical Education etc.
Create classes by assigning subjects and exams that belongs to that particular class.User can also set Class PIN which will add an extra layer of security
Create students by assigning each of them to a class. Extra student information can also be added!
Update student marks for each exams which the class is assigned wth. Add co-scholastic marks also with the exams.
Create Co-scholastic activities like Sports, or other extra curricular activities that can be added with an exam
Generate Report Card for each student in PDF format with many options including creating report card for selected exams only.
